com.ephesoft.dcma.da.service

Interface BatchClassEmailConfigService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchClassEmailConfigServiceImpl

    public interface BatchClassEmailConfigService
    This service deals with Batch Class Email Configurations.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    BatchClassEmailConfigServiceImpl
